name: Nature's Freedom
description: Creatures affected by your channel energy are not affected by difficult terrain.
prerequisites: Animal or Plant domain; channel energy class feature
benefit: When you expend one additional use when you channel energy, you enable affected creatures to move freely through undergrowth as per the druidâ€™s woodland stride class feature. This effect lasts a for number of minutes equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1). Multiple uses of this feat extend the duration of the woodland stride effect.
